thread.title: AT&T turns on Wi-Fi Calling for iPhone users - Channel3000
thread.title_full: AT&T turns on Wi-Fi Calling for iPhone users - Channel3000 - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Channel3000
title: AT&T turns on Wi-Fi Calling for iPhone users - Channel3000
text:
If you're an AT&T customer with an iPhone 6 or newer -- you can now make calls over Wi-Fi. The Wi-Fi Calling feature enables your phone to automatically switch to a Wi-Fi connection for regular calls when cell signals are low or unavailable, and Wi-Fi is available.
 Channel3000.
